attributes.action: Close preschools and nurseries under the same guidelines as schools!
attributes.additional_details: It is totally ridiculous to expect preschools and nurseries to "open to all" when primary schools and secondary schools are closed to all but critical  workers or vulnerable children.
attributes.background: The government has closed primary and secondary schools to all but critical keyworker children and vulnerable children. Preschools and Nurseries should be under the same guidelines.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
